channel.title: Carpet on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Carpet on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Cutting A Rug
item.description: Today in Tedium: I have a song stuck in my head right now. A jingle, really. It’s been stuck in my head for the last 15 years, at least. It’s probably stuck in your head, too—and if you’re near Chicago, it’s been stuck in your head since the days of disco. It’s the work of a man who spent decades trying to sell us carpet. Hardwood flooring too, maybe windows as well, but mostly carpet.
